boardgame.name: Anachrony
Анахронность
アナクロニー
时空错乱
아나크로니
boardgame.description: It is the late 26th century. Earth is recovering from a catastrophic explosion that exterminated the majority of the population centuries ago and made most of the surface uninhabitable due to unearthly weather conditions. The surviving humans organized along four radically different ideologies, called Paths, to rebuild the world as they see fit: Harmony, Dominance, Progress, and Salvation. Followers of the four Paths live in a fragile peace, but in almost complete isolation next to each other. Their only meeting point is the last major city on Earth, now just known as the Capital._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;By powering up the mysterious Time Rifts that opened in the wake of the cataclysm, each Path is able to reach back to specific moments in their past. Doing so can greatly speed up their progress, but too much meddling may endanger the time-space continuum. But progress is more important than ever before: if the mysterious message arriving through the Time Rift is to be believed, an even more terrible cataclysm is looming on the horizon: an asteroid bearing the mysterious substance called Neutronium is heading towards Earth. Even stranger, the scientists show that the energy signature of the asteroid matches the explosion centuries ago..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Anachrony features a unique two-tiered worker placement system. To travel to the Capital or venture out to the devastated areas for resources, players need not only various Specialists (Engineers, Scientists, Administrators, and Geniuses) but also Exosuits to protect and enhance them _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; and both are in short supply._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game is played in 4-7 turns, depending on the time when the looming cataclysm occurs (unless, of course, it is averted!). The elapsed turns are measured on a dynamic Timeline. By powering up the Time Rifts, players can reach back to earlier turns to supply their past _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;self_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; with resources. Each Path has a vastly different objective that rewards it with a massive amount of Victory Points when achieved. The Paths' settlements will survive the impact, but the Capital will not. Whichever Path manages to collect most points will be the new seat for the Capital, thus the most important force left on the planet..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: ***NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER*** Anachrony is expected to ship from the publisher in Q1, 2017. This listing is for the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Leader Box_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; edition of the game offered during the Kickstarter campaign. This edition will not be sold generally at retail. Mindclash Games offered four KS Exclusive box sleeves during the campaign, so you may request which sleeve you would like to receive with your pre-order: Path of Harmony Path of Dominance Path of Progress Path of Salvation The Leader Box includes: one copy of the Kickstarter version of Anachrony, including the Doomsday module, the Pioneers of New Earth module, 24 super-sized miniatures and all unlocked Stretch Goals and Path Goals. We do not yet know the shipping weight for this game, so shipping charges will be determined when the game arrives from the publishers. GLGames uses the lowest cost shipping option available, with no handling fees of any kind. Please contact us if you have any questions.

PRE-ORDER: This is for the Kickstarter Leader Box for the Path of Harmony edition of the game. This set will also include the Doomsday module and Pioneers of New Earth module, miniatures and all unlocked stretch and path goals. Estimated delivery (which is currently at the printer and on schedule) is scheduled for 2017 Q1 - possibly February, 2017. Buyer to pay shipping (likely will be Fed Ex Ground unless USPS priority mail is less expensive) and pay pal fee. (NOTE: Shipping costs are to be determined based on the packaging necessary to ship all of the above components).

***This game has not shipped yet*** This is for a copy of the kickstarter LEADER BOX with the Path of Progress box sleeve. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not trying to make any money on this so it is for the price I paid plus shipping. I will know what the shipping is as soon as I receive the game (depending on your location, it will probably be between $9-13). I should have this in the next 14 days according to the latest update but have not received a Funagain tracking number yet. If you purchase this I will just ship the game out as soon as I get it. I will share both the Funagain tracking and your own tracking so you can see it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s progress.

Anachrony: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Path Of Progress_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; sleeve Kickstarter Edition: Still in shrink, brand new and unopened. Heavy box (14lbs)! Comes with the Doomsday module, the Pioneers of New Earth module, 24 super-sized miniatures and all unlocked Kickstarter Stretch Goals and Path Goals. Buyer pays shipping fees (using the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Large Package_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; option (18Lx14Wx6H @14lbs) on the United States Postal Service Calculator located at https://postcalc.usps.com/ Be sure to click on _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Display All Options_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; to see all available prices) and any incurred PayPal fees (use Send Money to Friend option to avoid any fees). Seller is a dedicated gamer who will ensure that your purchase will be boxed securely for safe delivery in padded box.

LEADER BOX - Path of Harmony box sleeve - New in shrink - ~14 lbs. Retail edition and INCLUDES the Exosuit Commander Pack. The game has been played 7 times, always in a smoke-free environment. Some of the triangle chits are showing some minor wear since they have sharp points and are held in hand during portions of play. The acrylic resource cubes are also showing internal cracking (which seems to be the case for all of the copies of Anachrony from what I have read). However, I would still say the overall condition is excellent! Note: the miniatures were often coming loose from the bases, and so they were glued in place to avoid this annoyance during play. I thought this was worth mentioning since some players might prefer to be able to remove the miniatures from the base for painting or some other reason perhaps. Finally, shipping is likely to be about $20 to $25 due to the heavy weight of the game. I can ship or discard the expansion box depending on the buyer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s preference (shipping the expansion box might be slightly more expensive than shipping only the base game box - all contents fit into the base game box).
